page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE IN JARROW
page.content: My name is stephen and I'm 11 years old. At 5 o'clock on Saturday morning I got up and had{Shredded {Wheat}and a cup of tea for my breakfast. I fed Sheba, my dog. She is a full-pedigree alsatian. I turned the radio on and listened to{Metro Radio} for a while then I got dressed and took Sheba for a walk. When I came back I woke up the rest of my family. My mam sent me to the shops for her cigarettes and a pint of milk. It came to Â£1:48. Later I called on my friend. We played football in the street. At 12 o'clock I had fish and chips for my dinner. In the afternoon I went to the amusement arcade and played on the{ {space invaders.}I had salad for my tea about 5 o'clock. I played out. We played hide and seek then I went in to watch TV. I watched a horror film and went to bed about midnight.
